basics.name: Matej Plavevski
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Future University Student who enjoys coding, trying out new things and breaking them.

volunteer.summary: Translated Common Voice from English to Macedonian, translated some strings for Firefox and other products by Mozila
highlights: Recognized on Mozilla's Macedonia blog posts.

awards.title: CyberMK 2022 - 2nd Place
awards.awarder: Agency for Electronic Communications - North Macedonia
awards.summary: I won the 2nd place in North Macedonia for the CyberMK CTF organized by the Agency for Electronic Communications.

awards.title: Google Code-in 2018 Winner
awards.summary: Worked on Open Source Software for CCExtractor Development an organization that focused it's effort on extracting subtitles from video files.

awards.title: Generation Unlimited
awards.summary: Participated as Backend Developer for SpeakOut an App that helped victims of bullying connect with the community on a public forum or talk to professionals via a private chat.

projects.name: Using a Twitter Bot to Inform Authorities about Pollution Level and raise awareness about pollution
projects.description: A Twitter bot built with Python, the Twitter SDK and MyAir's API to ping politicans when pollution levels were above EU's AQI maximum value.
